_header: The Fathers Son of heaven bliss / Of a pure maid man become is
_description: James Ryman, A song of the Nativity and Passion — eight quatrains (aaab) and burden (bb): ‘The sone of god alone / Hath made vs free echeone’

CULEe112.First Lines:
The faders sonne of heven blisOf a pure man bicome
                    is…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…And euir to see his glorious facein heven blis
                    echeone
